newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Credit Lyonnais says buy Cemex.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Credit Lyonnais says buy Cemex.

text.p: Credit Lyonnais Securities said Tuesday it had started coverage of Cemex with a buy rating at a price of 32.30 pesos or $8.50 for the ADR.

"We believe that Cemex is significantly undervalued compared with the Mexican market and the cement sector," the brokerage said. "The company currently trades at 8.1x and 5.7x our 1996 and 1997 EV/EBITDA estimates versus an average of 11.1x and 8.2x for the other major Mexican cement companies."
Credit Lyonnais said it had set an 18-month target price of 51 pesos for the "B" shares, which were trading at 32 pesos, down 0.30, on Tuesday morning.
